title: MicroStrategy (Strategy) Increases Bitcoin Purchase to $2B Preferred Stock Offering
summary: Strategy raised its preferred stock offering from $500M to $2B at $90/share with 9% dividend to buy more Bitcoin. Company acquired 6,220 BTC for $739.9M last week, bringing total holdings to 607,770 BTC worth $72B+ (3% of total Bitcoin supply). Analysts project holdings could reach 900,000 BTC by 2027.

title: FTX Approves $1.9B Creditor Payout Beginning September 30th
summary: Court approved FTX to reduce claims reserve by $1.9B, enabling next creditor payout on September 30th via BitGo, Kraken, and Payoneer. Total payouts reach $6.2B so far, targeting $14.7B-$16.5B in recoveries with 98% of creditors receiving at least 119% of original claims.

title: Poseidon Raises $15M Seed Round for Physical AI Data Infrastructure
summary: a16z crypto leads $15M seed round for Poseidon, a platform building infrastructure for collecting and licensing real-world data for physical AI applications including robotics and autonomous systems. Founded by Sandeep Chinchali and Sarick Shah, incubated by Story Protocol to solve AI's growing data bottleneck.

title: Weekly Crypto Deal Flow Totals $91M Across Seven Funding Rounds
summary: Deal activity slowed with $91M total funding across seven rounds led by Poseidon ($15M), xTAO ($22.8M), and Soluna ($20M). Other notable rounds include ACM+ ($12M seed), DSRV ($11.6M Series B), Questflow ($6.5M seed), and Quack AI ($3.6M seed).
